CHAT.MESSAGE_TOO_LONG: You cannot send a message longer than {{chatMessageLengthLimit}} characters.
CHAT.SET_TIME_ARGUMENT_COUNT: Wrong arguments, usage: /settime HH MM, example: /settime 15 32.
CHAT.SET_TIME_INVALID_ARGUMENTS: The hours must be between 0 and 23, and the minutes between 0 and 59.

INFO.SERVER_ADDRESS: Connect to a server using its full address. Use the format address:port. The port defaults to 10578.
INFO.HELGEN: Do NOT connect to any server if you are still in the Helgen intro sequence. Make sure you just escaped Helgen first.

ERROR.CONNECTION: Could not connect to the specified server. Please make sure you've entered the correct address and that you're not experiencing network issues
ERROR.VERSION_MISMATCH: You cannot connect to the server because it does not have the same version of Skyrim Together as you.
ERROR.INVALID_ADDRESS: The address is of invalid format.

DISCONNECT.PROMPT: Are you sure you want to disconnect?

PARTY_MENU.EXPERIENCE_WARNING: For an optimal questing experience, make sure to read the playguide on our wiki, which you can find through our website, skyrim-together.com. Here is a small summary of the guidelines:

GUIDELINES.PARTY: By creating a party, you sort of become the "host", aka the party leader.
GUIDELINES.PARTY_LEADER_TALK: Only the party leader can talk to quest NPCs to progress quests.
GUIDELINES.PARTY_LEADER_LOOT_QUESTITEMS: Only the party leader can loot quest items.
GUIDELINES.KEEP_PARTY_LEADER: Stick to one party leader per playthrough.
GUIDELINES.ONE_PARTY_PER_SERVER: Stick to one party per server.

PARTY_MENU.NO_PLAYERS_IN_PARTY: There is nobody in your party yet. Invite them through the player list!

CLIENT.CONNECTION_LOST: Connection lost, trying to reconnect. {{remainingReconnectionAttempt}} attempts left.

COMMANDS.NOT_ADMIN: You must be an admin to use that command.

GROUP.ALREADY_IN_GROUP: You are already in a group. To join another group, please leave your current group.
GROUP.KICK_NO_PARTY_LEADER: You cannot kick other members as you are not the party leader.
GROUP.MAKE_LEADER_NO_PARTY_LEADER: You cannot make another member the leader as you are not the party leader.

ERRORS.WRONG_VERSION: This server expects version {{expectedVersion}} but you are on version {{version}}.
ERRORS.MODS_MISMATCH_REMOVE:
Please remove the following mods to join:
{{mods}}
ERRORS.MODS_MISMATCH_INSTALL:
Please install the following mods to join:
{{mods}}
ERRORS.CLIENT_MODS_DISALLOWED: This server disallows {{mods}}. Please remove them to join.
ERRORS.WRONG_PASSWORD: The password you entered is incorrect.
ERRORS.NO_REASON: The server refused connection without reason.
ERRORS.BAD_UGRIDSTOLOAD: It seems that your Skyrim.ini file has a non-default value for 'uGridsToLoad'. THIS IS A VERY BAD IDEA, and will most likely break the mod. Please set this setting back to its default (5), or remove the Skyrim.ini file and launch Skyrim vanilla once to generate a new file. The settings 'uExterior Cell Buffer' and 'uInterior Cell Buffer' should also be left at the default setting. If you do not know how to do this, please refer to our wiki or ask on our Discord server/Reddit sub for help.
ERRORS.NON_DEFAULT_INSTALL: It seems that your installation is not purely vanilla, i.e. it has Creation Club content (Anniversary Update or otherwise) or other mods. We do NOT recommend playing with mods. We recommend that you uninstall and disable these mods (instructions can be found on the wiki). For the best experience, you should have the following mod list: Skyrim.esm Update.esm Dawnguard.esm HearthFires.esm Dragonborn.esm _ResourcePack.esl SkyrimTogether.esp

PLAYER_LIST.PARTY_INVITE: {{from}} invited you to join a party
